meanings.sent1: The tired puppy looked jimpy as it lay in the sun.
meanings.sent2: She felt jimpy about going to the party after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The jimpy cat refused to chase the playful ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: His jimpy response to the exciting news was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The gray clouds cast a jimpy shadow over the gloomy town.

meanings.sent1: The jimpy pebble went unnoticed among the larger rocks.
meanings.sent2: Her jimpy necklace was overshadowed by the sparkling gems.
meanings.sent3: The jimpy ant struggled to carry the tiny crumb back to its nest.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, the ship appeared jimpy against the waves.
meanings.sent5: The jimpy flower bloomed quietly in the corner of the garden.

meanings.sent1: The squirrel jimpyed across the branches to reach its nest.
meanings.sent2: He jimpyed through the crowd to catch the bus before it left.
meanings.sent3: The dancer jimpyed around the stage, adding a unique flair to the performance.

meanings.sent5: The rabbit jimpyed away from the approaching fox, escaping into the bushes.
